## Checklist

<!-- Final checklist before requesting review -->

### Pre-Review

- [ ] Branch is up to date with base branch
- [ ] Conflicts resolved
- [ ] CI/CD passing
- [ ] All comments addressed
- [ ] Commit messages follow conventions
- [ ] PR title follows format: `type(scope): description`

### Documentation

- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] Inline code comments added (where needed)
- [ ] Changelog entry added (if applicable)
- [ ] Migration guide provided (if breaking change)

### Testing

- [ ] Tests written for new code
- [ ] Tests passing locally
- [ ] Edge cases covered
- [ ] Error handling tested
- [ ] Test coverage maintained or improved

### Code Quality

- [ ] Linting passes (`just lint` or `npm run lint`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (if using TypeScript)
- [ ] Code formatted (`just format` or `npm run format`)
- [ ] No unnecessary console logs
- [ ] No TODO comments (or tracked in issues)

### Security

- [ ] No secrets committed
- [ ] Dependencies updated and audited
- [ ] Input validation implemented
- [ ] Output sanitization implemented
- [ ] Security best practices followed

### Accessibility (if UI changes)

- [ ] Keyboard navigation works
- [ ] Screen reader friendly
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG standards
- [ ] Alt text for images
- [ ] ARIA labels where needed
